General.Name: Klarsen SA
General.Description: Klarsen operates as a data marketing agency in France and internationally. It operates marketing campaigns through various channels, such as SMS, email, phone, mobile, and postal address. The company was formerly known as Groupe Actiplay SA. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Bordeaux, France.

1.Name: Mr. Patrice  Coffe
1.Title: Chief Financial & Admin. Officer and Director
